Articles.Content: Does anyone know the current status of the James Webb Space Telescope? I think I can recall something about it being delayed however I am not sure.

I think you'll find most infos regarding the state of the project here

http://jwst.nasa.gov/recentaccomplish.html

And yes, current milestone was delayed until january 2015 at the moment (the midcourse correction thruster final assembly). Still stated for a 2018 launch for the moment.

Edited August 17, 2014 by sgt_flyer
Ah sweet, thank you. Good to know that it hasn't been canceled at this point.
